question: The term "Jakarta Concord" which was recently in news, is associated with:
option2: South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC)
explanation: The first Indian Ocean Rim Association (IORA) Leaders' Summit held on 7 March 2017 in Jakarta to commemorate the 20th Anniversary of the Association. The Vice-President of India led the Indian delegation. The Summit was preceded by meetings of the Council of Ministers and the Committee of Senior Officials. The Minister of State for External Affairs Gen (Dr) VK Singh (Retd) participated in the Council of Ministers while Secretary (ER) in MEA Shri Amar Sinha led the talks at the Committee of Senior Officials.
